name: Hu Tao
desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Hu Tao consumes a part of her HP, knocking nearby enemies back and entering the Paramita Papilio State.
Paramita Papilio State:
Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK.
Hu Tao's attack DMG is converted to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption.
In the Paramita Papilio state, Hu Tao's Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to enemies it hits.
Blood Blossom Effect:
Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s.
This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself.
Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or when Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Hu Tao commands a blazing spirit to deal Pyro DMG in a large AoE. Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 33%.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional Suspiciousdish of the same type.

sof.sof1_desc: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.
sof.sof2_desc: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
u Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.
